name: Enrollment in minority-serving institutions, by MSI type, degree program level, and whether majoring in S&E and S&E-related fields: 2016
description: Enrollment in minority-serving institutions, by MSI type, degree program level, and whether majoring in S&E and S&E-related fields: 2016

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: degree_program_level_and_s_e_and_s_e_related_field
variableMeasured.description: Degree program level and S&E and S&E-related field hierarchy

variableMeasured.name: field_asian_american_and_native_america_pacific_islander_serving_institutions
variableMeasured.description: Asian American And Native America Pacific Islander Serving Institutions

variableMeasured.name: field_historically_black_colleges_and_universities_and_predominantly_black_institutions
variableMeasured.description: Historically Black Colleges And Universities And Predominantly Black Institutions

variableMeasured.name: field_tribally_controlled_colleges_and_universities_alaska_native_and_native_hawaiian_serving_institutions_and_native_american_serving_nontribal_institutions
variableMeasured.description: Tribally Controlled Colleges And Universities Alaska Native And Native Hawaiian Serving Institutions And Native American Serving Nontribal Institutions

variableMeasured.name: field_institutions_with_more_than_one_msi_designation
variableMeasured.description: Institutions With More Than One Msi Designation

variableMeasured.name: field_percent_share_of_total_enrollment_in_any_msi
variableMeasured.description: Percent Share Of Total Enrollment In Any Msi

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Data are based on institutions eligible to participate in Title IV federal financial aid programs. Numbers presented are weighted counts and are rounded to the nearest hundred. Detail may not sum to totals because of rounding.
sources: National Center for Education Statistics, 2015–16 National Postsecondary Student Aid Study (NPSAS:16); U.S. Department of Education, Office of Postsecondary Education, 2022 Eligibility Matrix, https://www2.ed.gov/about/offices/list/ope/idues/eligibility.html, accessed 17 July 2023. Science and Engineering Indicators
